title: Sound On: Jan 6 Hearing, Trump Tantrums, Limo Lunge
itunes:title: Sound On: Jan 6 Hearing, Trump Tantrums, Limo Lunge
description:
Guests: Emily Wilkins, Bloomberg Government Congress reporter and Asha Rangappa, senior lecturer at Yale University’s Jackson Institute for Global Affairs discussed former White House aide Cassidy Hutchinson's testimony before the January 6th committee, Cary Franklin, Faculty Director of the Center on Reproductive Health, Law, and Policy at UCLA School of Law discussed the next legal steps for abortion rights along with today's politics panel, Bloomberg Politics Contributors Jeanne Sheehan Zaino and Rick Davis. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
